definition:
A maximal subgraph of a graph is a *clique*, and the *clique number*
$\omega(G)$ of a graph $G$ is the maximal order of a clique in $G$.
Simply, $\omega(G)$ is the maximal order of a subgraph of $G$. Some
authors however define a clique as any subgraph of $G$ and refer to the
other definition as *maximum clique*.
